entry.title: 08 - Cloudinary Media Library
entry.summary: Register on Cloudinary. Go to config.php, add your cloud name and API key under the services key. Now you can use the media() helper in your Blade templates to easily reference files in your Cloudinary library. <img src="{{ media('logo.png')...

entry.title: 07 - Netlify CMS
entry.summary: The included files related to Netlify CMS should work out of the box. Just make sure that your Netlify Identity settings and Git Gateway settings are correctly configured. You can change the Netlify CMS version being used in config.php under the...

entry.title: 06 - Code Highlighting
entry.summary: Below are some examples of code blocks with syntax highlighting. Go to source/_assets/js/highlight.js to view/change the registered languages. Go to source/_assets/sass/main.scss to change the theme. HTML (and XML) <div class="flex-center...

entry.title: 05 - Formcarry Contact Form
entry.summary: Register on Formcarry and get your Formcarry ID. Then go to config.php and add your ID under the services key. Go to source/_assets/js/contact.js and change fakeSend(contactForm) to send(contactForm) in the lines shown below. e.preventDefault();...

entry.title: 04 - Disqus Comments
entry.summary: Register the website on Disqus. Get your Disqus shortname, go to config.php and add your shortname under the services key.

entry.title: 03 - Google Analytics
entry.summary: Register the website on Google Analytics. Get your tracking ID, go to config.php and add your ID under the services key. The master template is designed to only include analytics in production. This is to avoid tracking page views while you are...

entry.title: 02 - Favicons
entry.summary: Recommendation: RealFaviconGenerator You should put all of your favicon-related files in source/_assets/favicons. They will be automatically copied into the root of the build directory. Go to source/_partials/head/favicon.blade.php to change the...
